image.author: petros
image.post: The Shroud was made front image and back at the same moment, and there are no singes on the cloth, nor is the cloth bent into burnt creases along delineations of the Image, nor imprinted differently where it is darker than where lighter as in those poor samples above..
image.title: The Turin Shroud Man is not a photograph, but a negative THERMOGRAPH – and I challenge anyone to prove otherwise…
